summary: Frontend testing completed for Turkish AI UGC video creation platform. All requested features verified: Landing page, DifferenceSection with product image and video, Neden Biz section with 7 items each, Stats row (90%, 10x, 300%, 24/7), Sectors section with 12 sectors and +50 badge, Footer with 4 columns, all 4 legal pages (Gizlilik, Kullanım Şartları, Çerez, KVKK), Auth modal, and Login flow.

issues: Video playback shows console errors due to browser autoplay restrictions - expected behavior, not a bug

critical_code_review_comments: Product image uses object-top for better cropping
Neden Biz section has 7 items in each comparison card
Stats row shows all 4 metrics correctly
Sectors section shows 12 sectors with +50 badge
Footer has 4 columns: Brand, Hızlı Linkler, Yasal, İletişim
All 4 legal pages load correctly with proper content and back navigation
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Video autoplay errors in console are browser policy restrictions, not application bugs. Login flow works with provided credentials. Dashboard shows user's 3 videos after login.

tests_executed.details: Page loads with HTTP 200, hero section visible
